original_text: “There was a rich man who was dressed in purple and fine linen and lived in luxury every day.
korean_text: 한 부자가 있어 자색 옷과 고운 베옷을 입고 날마다 호화롭게 즐기더라

sentences.original_text: who was dressed in purple and fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자색 옷과 고운 베옷을 입고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and lived in luxury every day
